page.title: 08Education.
page.content: {Our School. } Our school is very old. Opened in 1879, the building now has a new porch, classroom, dining room and a staff room added to the original single room. The playground in front of our school has been there ever since the school was built, but now it is tarred so it is not rough and stoney any more. There are two classrooms in our school. In one classroom there are primaries one, two, three and four. In the other room are primaries five, six and seven. We all have school dinners and they cost fifty pence a day. We have a main course and a pudding. Sometimes we have soup. There is a dinner lady who comes to school to clean. Our dinners are brought in a taxi from another school.
